name: Silver Nickel "Whistleblower"
description:
beginner OPSEC puzzle adventure

(top SPACE key to fast-forward through cutscenes)

Before being lost to time for unknown reasons, the ancient civilization of Atlantis had advanced all the way to the information age.

And as in any information age, bulk surveillance systems are collecting data about everything you do. It's not just creepy— anything you say can be used, taken out of context, to malign you in the event that corporations or governments disagree with
your words.

Join Emily, an inspector for the Food Health Administration, in this adventure to prevent Foodcorp from putting the people of Atlantis at great risk, in the name of corporate profit.

Learn how to protect your own digital privacy in this educational adventure!

Be the first to hear when the full "Whistleblower" game is released at silvernickel.org
